attributes.action: CALL ON MP’s TO VOTE TO LEAVE THE EU ON MARCH 29 WITHOUT A DEAL AS INSTRUCTED
attributes.background: MP’s should abide by the democratic voice of the majority of people who voted for BREXIT in the 2016 referendum especially as they are elected and employed by the people to do our bidding even if the MP’s do not agree and think they know best.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to be about something the UK Government or Parliament are responsible for.

How an MP votes would be an individual decision for that person, and not a decision for the Government or Parliament as a whole.

You could talk to your own MP about how they are going to vote. You can find out who your MP is and how to contact them here: 
https://www.parliament.uk/mps-lords-and-offices/mps/

You could also sign this petition instead:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/229963
